template.subject: Demande de couverture : Crise des droits de l'homme en Iran
template.body:
Dear {{recipientName}},

I am writing from {{senderCountry}} to request increased coverage of the humanitarian crisis in Iran.

Since 28 December 2025:
â€¢ Over 51 protesters have been killed by Iranian security forces
â€¢ More than 2,270 people have been detained
â€¢ A nationwide internet blackout has been imposed
â€¢ Live ammunition has been used against peaceful demonstrators

French media, particularly RFI's Persian Service and France 24, play an important role in reaching Iranian audiences and the international Francophone community. Your coverage can:

1. Document human rights violations for the historical record
2. Inform global audiences about the crisis
3. Support the Iranian people's right to know what is happening
4. Encourage French and EU diplomatic responses

I respectfully request continued and expanded coverage of this critical situation.

With sincere appreciation,
A concerned citizen from {{senderCountry}}

targetingRationale.en: RFI Persian reaches Iranian audiences directly. France 24 broadcasts in multiple languages to a global audience. Le Monde influences French policy circles.
